body_html: I did write the original code, but I have not kept up with the recent changes, so I may not be the best person to help with this. But I believe this was indeed originally because embedding_lookup indexes along the first dimension, as you mention. Also, to me CxH seems like the "logical" dimensions for the weight matrix, but I guess that's to some extent a matter of opinion :)

body: I did write the original code, but I have not kept up with the recent changes, so I may not be the best person to help with this. But I believe this was indeed originally because embedding_lookup indexes along the first dimension, as you mention. Also, to me CxH seems like the "logical" dimensions for the weight matrix, but I guess that's to some extent a matter of opinion :)
